name: Omen Fall
description:
Kayra's nightmare has come true!
The evil, left behind by the demon he destroyed long ago, has infected their beloved leader.
Chaos now reigns in the lands of Aytol, Kuntog and Odgur.
The only way to stop the evil is to give the demon's soul a new body to purify its chaos.

Resurrect as Neu who is forced to share his body with the demon's soul and set out to save the soul of the nine İye leaders possessed by evil.
Throughout your journey, fight creatures eager to destroy you.




• Wander in the Mysterious Lands: Explore the vast and mysterious lands of Aytol, Küntog and Odgur.



• Face Powerful Warlords: Confront the Nine İyes, discover how they move, in order to avoid their deadly attacks and defeat them.



• Deadly Battles: Test your patience to avoid being eaten by different disgusting creatures. Die with Neu, for whom, death is forbidden, and resurrect from your Balbal.



• Learn and Improve: Upgrade the new abilities you gain and use them as you wish, find mystical items waiting to be discovered, and strengthen Neu's body.

• Uncover the veil of the story's Mystery: Find out the truth behind a special drama inspired by a legend.

• Enjoy pixel graphics and animations.
